name: NeonRiders
description:
Grab a friend and duel until one of you falls or the time runs out! 

You can pick any color you want in the options menu!

Before you press play click on the "?" button!

Rules are simple :

-You can only stand on platforms  of the same color as you!

-Shoot a platform to make it yours!

-If a round lasts for more than 60 seconds the point will go to the player with more platforms of his color!

-First one to get 5 points wins!

-Dont forget to leave a comment and tell me what you think.
